attributes.action: Do not scrap the Blackburn Burnley and Pendle hospital shuttle bus
attributes.additional_details: There has been no alternatives to the termination proposed and many feel implementing a small charge will reduce the cost to the trust and allow people to continue their journeys. There are no other direct public transport routes from towns in the A&E catchment area such as Colne and taxi would be in the region of £50-60 return trip all playing an impact. The hospital also relies on bank nursing staff who use this service so also affects staffing levels and patient care within the hospital.
attributes.background: Stop the termination of the shuttle bus from Royal Blackburn Teaching Hospital Burnley General Teaching Hospital (BGTH) and Pendle Community Hospital the bus was set up as a condition of the closure of BGTH A&E to allow patients visitors and staff to attend appointments, work and visit patients.
